attributes.action: Introduce a 'Stolen Valour Act', making it an offence to falsely claim to have served in, or wear the uniforms or insignia, of any unit of H.M. Forces for the purposes of financial, personal, or commercial gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
